signals.problem_statement: It is difficult to track whether emails sent to a single info address have been responded to.
signals.customer_ask: We want to see how emails get treated and who responded to them.
signals.context: Museum with a team of about 10 people managing public inquiries via email.

signals.problem_statement: There is a need for statistics on the number of questions answered over the year.
signals.customer_ask: We want to see statistics over the year, like how many questions we answered.
signals.context: Museum with a team of about 10 people managing public inquiries via email.

signals.problem_statement: The current email management solution does not provide sufficient visibility into email workload distribution among team members.
signals.customer_ask: How is there a possibility to follow up for me as a manager?
signals.context: Museum with a team of about 10 people managing public inquiries via email.
